about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to Entropy : Zero - with some unused extras!

Includes original Half-Life tracks remixed by John Richardson and Morch Kovalski, and original tracks by Spencer Baggett.

All tracks are MP3, and you can find them in the game's directory in a folder called EZ_OST.

Track List:
  • 1. No One Rides For Free - 00:06:00
  • 2. Choices - 00:01:26
  • 3. What Was That? - 00:02:52
  • 4. Bad Cop - 00:02:52
  • 5. Dead Tenant - 00:00:42
  • 6. Kill Bound - 00:02:07
  • 7. They Watch Our Every Move - 00:03:11
  • 8. Low - 00:04:46
  • 9. On a Rail - 00:00:52
  • 10. Something Might Be Wrong - 00:02:49
  • 11. We Need Backup - 00:02:49
  • 12. Penultimatum - 00:03:30
  • 13. Absolute Zero - 00:01:34
  • 14. Greater Things Await - 00:02:44
  • 15. Full Frontal Lobotomy - 00:02:07
  • 16. Guard Down - 00:04:48
  • 17. Farside (unused) - 00:00:57
  • 18. Synapse (unused) - 00:03:15
  • 19. Out of Time (unused) - 00:02:34
  • 20. Mind Behind the Mask (unused) - 00:04:20
  • 21. Pillar 10 (unused) - 00:01:48
  • 22. Vort Soul (unused) - 00:01:15

This soundtrack will be updated as more chapters are added to Entropy : Zero.

name: Entropy : Zero Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 (32/64-bit)/Windows 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 8.1 level Graphics Card (Requires support for SSE)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10 (32/64-bit)/Windows 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 processor (3.0GHz, or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 level Graphics Card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: The official soundtrack to Entropy : Zero - with some unused extras! Includes original Half-Life tracks remixed by John Richardson and Morch Kovalski, and original tracks by Spencer Baggett.
